mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GLTB(GL_NM, GL_CTS, REGI_DATE, MODY_DATE, SHOWMAIN_YN) VALUES(#{gllyNm},#{gllyCts}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{showMainYn})
INSERT INTO FILETB(GL_NO, FILE_NM_KEY, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, REGI_DATE) VALUES(#{gllyNo},#{fileNameKey},#{filePath},#{fileSize},SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT GL_NO AS gllyNo ,GL_NM AS gllyNm ,GL_CTS AS gllyCts ,FILE_PATH as filePath ,SHOWMAIN_YN as showMainYn ,DATE_FORMAT(REGI_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regiDate ,DATE_FORMAT(MODY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modyDate FROM GLTB WHERE GL_NO = #{gllyNo}
